document.docAuthor: Andrade, Luiz F. & Senna, André R.
document.masterDocTitle: Four new species of Cymadusa Savigny, 1816 (Amphipoda: Ampithoidae) and new records of C. filosa Savigny, 1816 from Brazilian coast

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Four new species of Cymadusa Savigny, 1816 (Amphipoda: Ampithoidae) and new records of C. filosa Savigny, 1816 from Brazilian coast

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. The species
C. smilodonta
seems to have an absent accessory flagellum on Antenna 1. However, we did not add this information to create a new amended diagnosis because this structure is very fragile and could have been lost during the material manipulation. Otherwise, we decided to add the absence of accessory flagellum as a valid character on the identification key to world species of
Cymadusa
.
